00021 class ThresholdDecider:public Decider {
00022 protected:
00023   int myIndex;
00024 
00025   double threshold;
00026 
00029   std::map<Signal*, int> currentSignals;
00030 
00031   enum {
00032     FIRST,
00033     HEADER_OVER,
00034     SIGNAL_OVER
00035   };
00036 
00037 protected:
00038 
00042   simtime_t handleNewSignal(Signal* s){
00043     //set the state the signal will be in the next time we get it
00044     currentSignals[s] = HEADER_OVER;
00045 
00046     log("First processing of this signal. Scheduling it to end of header to decide if Signal should be received.");
00047     //we say that the length of the header is at 10% of the length of the signal
00048     return s->getSignalStart() + 0.10 * s->getSignalLength();
00049   }
00050 
00054   simtime_t handleHeaderOver(std::map<Signal*, int>::iterator& it){
00055     log("Second receive of a signal from Phy - Deciding if packet should be received - Let's try to receive it.");
00056     //we don't really do something after the header, so we only update the next state
00057     it->second = SIGNAL_OVER;
00058     return it->first->getSignalStart() + it->first->getSignalLength();
00059   }
00060 
00064   simtime_t handleSignalOver(std::map<Signal*, int>::iterator& it, AirFrame* frame){
00065     log("Last receive of signal from Phy - Deciding if the packet could be received correctly...");
00066 
00067     //get the receiving power from the signal (calculated at each call of
00068     //this method
00069     //Mapping* receivingPower = it->first->getReceivingPower();
00070 
00071 
00072     //------print the mappings----------------------
00073     ev << "Sending power mapping: " << endl;
00074     printMapping(it->first->getTransmissionPower());
00075 
00076     ConstMapping* receivingPower;
00077 
00078     simtime_t delay = it->first->getPropagationDelay();
00079     if(delay == 0)
00080       receivingPower = it->first->getTransmissionPower()->constClone();
00081     else
00082       receivingPower = new ConstDelayedMapping(it->first->getTransmissionPower(), delay);
00083 
00084     std::list<ConstMapping*> attList = it->first->getAttenuation();
00085     int count = 1;
00086     for(std::list<ConstMapping*>::const_iterator aIt = attList.begin();
00087       aIt != attList.end(); ++aIt){
00088 
00089       ev << endl;
00090       ev << " multiplied with Attenuation " << count;
00091       switch(count){
00092       case 1:
00093         ev << "(Radiostate)";
00094         break;
00095       case 2:
00096         ev << "(Pathloss)";
00097         break;
00098       case 3:
00099         ev << "(Random time and freq attenuation)";
00100         break;
00101       case 4:
00102         ev << "(Random freq only attenuation)";
00103         break;
00104       }
00105       ev << ":" << endl;
00106       printMapping(*aIt);
00107       ++count;
00108 
00109       ConstMapping* tmp = MappingUtils::multiply(*receivingPower, **aIt, 0.0);
00110       delete receivingPower;
00111       receivingPower = tmp;
00112 
00113       ev << endl;
00114       ev << " result:" << endl;
00115       printMapping(receivingPower);
00116     }
00117 
00118     ev << endl;
00119     ev << "Receiving power calculated.\n";
00120     ev << "Signal receiving power. (Should be same as above)\n";
00121     printMapping(it->first->getReceivingPower());
00122 
00123     ev << endl;
00124     ev << "Threshold is " << toDecibel(threshold) << "dbm" << endl;
00125     //----------------------------------------------
00126 
00127     bool toWeak = false;
00128 
00129     //iterate over receiving power mapping and chekc if every value is bigger
00130     //then the threshold
00131     ConstMappingIterator* mIt = receivingPower->createConstIterator();
00132 
00133     while(mIt->inRange()){
00134       if(mIt->getValue() < threshold){
00135         // print receiving power if too weak
00136         ev << "receiving power: " << mIt->getValue() << endl;
00137         toWeak = true;
00138         break;
00139       }
00140 
00141       if(!mIt->hasNext())
00142         break;
00143 
00144       mIt->next();
00145     }
00146 
00147     delete mIt;
00148     delete receivingPower;
00149 
00150     if(toWeak){
00151       log("...signal is to weak -> discard.");
00152     } else {
00153       log("...strong enough -> forwarding it to Mac layer.");
00154       phy->sendUp(frame, new DeciderResult(true));
00155     }
00156 
00157     currentSignals.erase(it);
00158     return -1;
00159   }

00167   double toDecibel(double v){
00168     return 10.0 * log10(v);
00169   }

00171   template<class T>
00172   std::string toString(T v, unsigned int length){
00173     char* tmp = new char[255];
00174     sprintf(tmp, "%.2f", v);
00175 
00176     std::string result(tmp);
00177     delete[] tmp;
00178     while(result.length() < length)
00179       result += " ";
00180     return result;
00181   }

00183   std::string toString(simtime_t v, unsigned int length){
00184     return toString(SIMTIME_DBL(v), length);
00185   }

00190   void printMapping(ConstMapping* m){
00191     Dimension frequency("frequency");
00192     //const DimensionSet& dims = m->getDimensionSet();
00193 
00194     std::set<simtime_t> timeEntries;
00195     std::set<double> freqEntries;
00196 
00197     std::map<double, std::set<simtime_t> > entries;
00198 
00199     ConstMappingIterator* it = m->createConstIterator();
00200 
00201     while(it->inRange()){
00202       entries[it->getPosition().getArgValue(frequency)].insert(it->getPosition().getTime());
00203       timeEntries.insert(it->getPosition().getTime());
00204       freqEntries.insert(it->getPosition().getArgValue(frequency));
00205 
00206       if(!it->hasNext())
00207         break;
00208 
00209       it->next();
00210     }
00211 
00212     delete it;
00213 
00214     ev << "------+---------------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00215     ev << "f\\t   | ";
00216     for(std::set<simtime_t>::const_iterator tIt = timeEntries.begin();
00217       tIt != timeEntries.end(); ++tIt){
00218       ev << toString(*tIt * 1000, 6) << " ";
00219     }
00220     ev << endl;
00221     ev << "------+---------------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00222     Argument pos;
00223     for(std::set<double>::const_iterator fIt = freqEntries.begin();
00224       fIt != freqEntries.end(); ++fIt){
00225       ev << toString(*fIt, 5) << " | ";
00226       pos.setArgValue(frequency, *fIt);
00227 
00228       std::map<double, std::set<simtime_t> >::iterator tmpIt = entries.find(*fIt);
00229 
00230       for(std::set<simtime_t>::const_iterator tIt = timeEntries.begin();
00231         tIt != timeEntries.end(); ++tIt){
00232 
00233         if(tmpIt != entries.end() && tmpIt->second.find(*tIt) != tmpIt->second.end()){
00234           pos.setTime(*tIt);
00235           ev << toString(toDecibel(m->getValue(pos)), 6) << " ";
00236         } else {
00237           ev << "       ";
00238         }
00239       }
00240       ev << endl;
00241     }
00242     ev << "------+---------------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00243   }

00245 public:
00246   ThresholdDecider(DeciderToPhyInterface* phy, int myIndex, double threshold):
00247     Decider(phy), myIndex(myIndex), threshold(threshold) {}
00248 
00253   virtual simtime_t processSignal(AirFrame* frame) {
00254     Signal* s = &frame->getSignal();
00255 
00256     //Check if we already know this signal...
00257     std::map<Signal*, int>::iterator it = currentSignals.find(s);
00258 
00259     //if not, we handle it as a new signal
00260     if(it == currentSignals.end()) {
00261       return handleNewSignal(s);
00262 
00263     //otherwise handle it depending on the state it currently is in
00264     } else {
00265       switch(it->second) {
00266       case HEADER_OVER:
00267         return handleHeaderOver(it);
00268 
00269       case SIGNAL_OVER:
00270         return handleSignalOver(it, frame);
00271 
00272       default:
00273         break;
00274       }
00275     }
00276 
00277     //we should never get here!
00278     assert(false);
00279     return 0;
00280   }
00281 
00282   virtual ChannelState getChannelState() {
00283     return ChannelState(false, 0);
00284   }
00285   virtual simtime_t handleChannelSenseRequest(ChannelSenseRequest*) {
00286     return -1;
00287   }
00288 };
